title: Repeated Transaction Link
description: Links individual transactions to their corresponding repeated transactions, managing and tracking their occurrence with a specific focus on modifications or deletions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the link record.

repeatedTransactionId.description: Identifier of the associated repeated transaction.

expectedDate.description: The date when the linked transaction is expected to occur.

repeatedStatus.description: Status of the repeated transaction link, indicating if it has been modified or deleted.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the link was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the link. Nullable to accommodate links that have not been updated.
